**斧**（axe）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。斧属于[单手](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%95%E6%89%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "单手 (page does not exist)")使用的[近战](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "近战 (page does not exist)")武器，但也可以作为[投掷](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%95%E6%8E%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "投掷 (page does not exist)")武器或工具[使用](/index.php?title=%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "使用 (page does not exist)")。

## 生成

斧在随机生成的武器里占4%。

[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时有50%的概率获得一把斧作为副武器[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[忍者](/index.php?title=%E5%BF%8D%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "忍者 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄4的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")斧[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。非亡灵的[矮人](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矮人（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")生成时若携带[矮人短剑](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E7%9F%AD%E5%89%91 "矮人短剑")，则有1⁄4的概率携带斧[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

## 斧技能

| 斧    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| 基础   | - [游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| 熟练   | * [穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")、[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")、[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)") |
| 老练   | - [野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                |

斧和[战斧](/wiki/%E6%88%98%E6%96%A7 "战斧")使用斧技能。[撕裂者](/index.php?title=%E6%92%95%E8%A3%82%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "撕裂者 (page does not exist)")是一种[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类战斧。

斧类武器对[木魔像](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E9%AD%94%E5%83%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木魔像 (page does not exist)")能额外造成d4伤害[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

玩家能够[使用](/index.php?title=%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "使用 (page does not exist)")持握的斧类武器，并指定方向来破坏该方向上相邻的[门](/index.php?title=%E9%97%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "门 (page does not exist)")，或是攻击相邻怪物，或是砍下相邻的[树](/index.php?title=%E6%A0%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "树 (page does not exist)")。[挖洞怪物](/index.php?title=%E6%8C%96%E6%B4%9E%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "挖洞怪物 (page does not exist)")若持有斧，也能进行此类动作。

砍倒树木有20%概率生成一个随机的[水果](/wiki/%E6%B0%B4%E6%9E%9C "水果")，即使你之前已经通过[踢](/index.php?title=%E8%B8%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "踢 (page does not exist)")树的方法从同一棵树上获取过水果[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。试图用斧破坏[商店](/index.php?title=%E5%95%86%E5%BA%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "商店 (page does not exist)")的门会产生一条特殊消息，且角色会放弃破门，但如果继续尝试破门，最终仍会将门摧毁，并激怒[店主](/index.php?title=%E5%BA%97%E4%B8%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "店主 (page does not exist)")[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。试图用斧砍[雕像](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%95%E5%83%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雕像 (page does not exist)")会产生一条特殊的消息，并使角色受到至多2点伤害。

持握斧时，你能够仅用六回合打开非祝福的[罐头](/wiki/%E7%BD%90%E5%A4%B4 "罐头")。

## 策略

斧的伤害较为一般，但它非常适合在玩家缺少[开锁工具](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%80%E9%94%81%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "开锁工具 (page does not exist)")时用作破门工具。

使用斧破门比起用脚踢门更加安全，因为用斧破坏商店门时会自动停下，从而避免向店主支付400[金币](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")的赔偿。不要在[矿坑镇](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%BF%E5%9D%91%E9%95%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矿坑镇 (page does not exist)")[警卫员](/index.php?title=%E8%AD%A6%E5%8D%AB%E5%91%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "警卫员 (page does not exist)")的视野范围内用斧砍树，否则你会激怒他。

## 历史

斧最初在[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的衍生版本Hack 1.21和PDP-11版Hack中出现，也是[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")中最初加入游戏的物品之一。

## 消息

- 这扇门似乎非常难砍开。（This door seems too hard to chop through.）

  你尝试用斧类武器破坏商店门。

- 停下，破坏者！你被捕了！（Halt, vandal! You're under arrest!）

  你被警卫员发现用斧类武器破坏树木或门。

* 当你猛击雕像时它迸出火花。（Sparks fly as you whack the statue.）

  你试图用斧类武器砍雕像。

* 斧柄剧烈地震颤！（The axe-handle vibrates violently!）

  同上，你因此受到了伤害。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Axe/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") an axe will produce a battle-axe and vice versa.

An axe appears in the left center courtyard of the [Yeoman quest](/wiki/Yeoman_quest "Yeoman quest") locate level.

[Giantkiller](/wiki/Giantkiller "Giantkiller") is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") axe that replaces [Giantslayer](/wiki/Giantslayer "Giantslayer") from *NetHack*.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the peaceful [iron golem](/wiki/Iron_golem "Iron golem") generated in the forest within the [Ruins of Moria](/wiki/Ruins_of_Moria "Ruins of Moria") is always generated with an axe.

### dNetHack

[dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") add the [diskos](/index.php?title=Diskos\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Diskos (page does not exist)") and [moon axe](/index.php?title=Moon_axe\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Moon axe (page does not exist)") as weapons that use the axe skill, and all axes deal an extra d4 damage to [plants](/wiki/Plant_\(dNetHack\) "Plant (dNetHack)") and wooden enemies. The diskos uses the higher between a character's axe and [polearms](/wiki/Polearms "Polearms") skills for damage if they are not twoweaponing or using a shield, and will otherwise default to axe skill if either is applicable.

Carrying [The Air Crystal](/wiki/The_Air_Crystal "The Air Crystal") raises skill in axes by one level. [Marionette, Puppet of Screams](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\)#Marionette.2C_Puppet_of_Screams "Spirits (dNetHack)") is a spirit that grants skill in axes while bound.

Giantslayer's [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is changed to an axe, and [The Rod of Lordly Might](/wiki/The_Rod_of_Lordly_Might "The Rod of Lordly Might") and [The Sceptre of Lolth](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Sceptre_of_Lolth "DNetHack artifacts") can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") to take on the form of an appropriate axe.

### SpliceHack

[SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") introduces the [throwing axe](/wiki/Throwing_axe "Throwing axe") as a weapon that uses the axe skill and can be [multishot](/wiki/Multishot "Multishot") when thrown.

At a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace"), two axes can be combined to create a battle-axe, and an axe can be combined with a pick-axe to create a dwarvish mattock.

### EvilHack

[EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") adds the [dwarvish bearded axe](/wiki/Dwarvish_bearded_axe "Dwarvish bearded axe") as a weapon that uses the axe skill.

An axe is always generated on the first floor of the [Ice Queen's Realm](/wiki/Ice_Queen%27s_Realm "Ice Queen's Realm") and the third floor of [Vecna's Domain](/wiki/Vecna%27s_Domain "Vecna's Domain") at level creation.

An axe can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") and a [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear"). Axes can be used to create a few items:

- An axe can be combined with a dwarvish short sword to create a dwarvish bearded axe.
- An axe can be combined with a [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword") to create a battle-axe.
- An axe can be combined with a [ranseur](/wiki/Ranseur "Ranseur") to create a [halberd](/wiki/Halberd "Halberd").
- An axe can be combined with a spear to create a [voulge](/wiki/Voulge "Voulge").

### SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, dwarven characters in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") can reach a minimum of Skilled in axes.

[Frostbite](/index.php?title=Frostbite\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Frostbite (page does not exist)") is an artifact weapon that uses the axe skill.

### Hack'EM

[Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM") adds the dwarvish bearded axe from EvilHack and the throwing axe from SpliceHack.

An axe can be upgraded to a throwing axe, and vice versa. In addition to EvilHack forging recipes, axes can be used in two other recipes:

- An axe can be combined with a dagger to create a throwing axe.
- Two axes can be combined to create a battle-axe.

## 百科文本

"For ev'ry silver ringing blow,  
Cities and palaces shall grow!"  
  
"Bite deep and wide, O Axe, the tree,  
Tell wider prophecies to me."  
  
"When rust hath gnaw'd me deep and red,  
A nation strong shall lift his head.  
  
"His crown the very Heav'ns shall smite,  
Aeons shall build him in his might."  
  
"Bite deep and wide, O Axe, the tree;  
Bright Seer, help on thy prophecy!"

\[ Malcolm's Katie, by Isabella Valancey Crawford ]

生成

斧在随机生成的武器里占4%。

野蛮人在游戏开始时有50%的概率获得一把斧作为副武器[1]。

忍者生成时有1⁄4的概率携带斧[2]。非亡灵的矮人生成时若携带矮人短剑，则有1⁄4的概率携带斧[3]。

斧技能

斧和战斧使用斧技能。撕裂者是一种神器类战斧。

斧类武器对木魔像能额外造成d4伤害[4]。

玩家能够使用持握的斧类武器，并指定方向来破坏该方向上相邻的门，或是攻击相邻怪物，或是砍下相邻的树。挖洞怪物若持有斧，也能进行此类动作。

砍倒树木有20%概率生成一个随机的水果，即使你之前已经通过踢树的方法从同一棵树上获取过水果[5]。试图用斧破坏商店的门会产生一条特殊消息，且角色会放弃破门，但如果继续尝试破门，最终仍会将门摧毁，并激怒店主[6]。试图用斧砍雕像会产生一条特殊的消息，并使角色受到至多2点伤害。

持握斧时，你能够仅用六回合打开非祝福的罐头。

策略

斧的伤害较为一般，但它非常适合在玩家缺少开锁工具时用作破门工具。

使用斧破门比起用脚踢门更加安全，因为用斧破坏商店门时会自动停下，从而避免向店主支付400金币的赔偿。不要在矿坑镇警卫员的视野范围内用斧砍树，否则你会激怒他。

'''斧'''（axe）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[武器]]。斧属于[[单手]]使用的[[近战]]武器，但也可以作为[[投掷]]武器或工具[[使用]]。

== 生成 ==
斧在随机生成的武器里占4%。

[[野蛮人]]在游戏开始时有50%的概率获得一把斧作为副武器{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|43|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[忍者]]生成时有{{frac|4}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]斧{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|268|nethack=3.6.7}}。非亡灵的[[矮人（怪物属性）|矮人]]生成时若携带[[矮人短剑]]，则有{{frac|4}}的概率携带斧{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|378|nethack=3.6.7}}。

== 斧技能 ==
{{axe skill table/zh-CN}}

斧和[[战斧]]使用斧技能。[[撕裂者]]是一种[[神器武器|神器]]类战斧。

斧类武器对[[木魔像]]能额外造成d4伤害{{refsrc|src/weapon.c|324|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

玩家能够[[使用]]持握的斧类武器，并指定方向来破坏该方向上相邻的[[门]]，或是攻击相邻怪物，或是砍下相邻的[[树]]。[[挖洞怪物]]若持有斧，也能进行此类动作。

砍倒树木有20%概率生成一个随机的[[水果]]，即使你之前已经通过[[踢]]树的方法从同一棵树上获取过水果{{refsrc|src/dig.c|401|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。试图用斧破坏[[商店]]的门会产生一条特殊消息，且角色会放弃破门，但如果继续尝试破门，最终仍会将门摧毁，并激怒[[店主]]{{refsrc|src/dig.c|475|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。试图用斧砍[[雕像]]会产生一条特殊的消息，并使角色受到至多2点伤害。

持握斧时，你能够仅用六回合打开非祝福的[[罐头]]。

== 策略 ==
斧的伤害较为一般，但它非常适合在玩家缺少[[开锁工具]]时用作破门工具。

使用斧破门比起用脚踢门更加安全，因为用斧破坏商店门时会自动停下，从而避免向店主支付400[[金币]]的赔偿。不要在[[矿坑镇]][[警卫员]]的视野范围内用斧砍树，否则你会激怒他。

== 历史 ==
斧最初在[[Jay Fenlason's Hack]]的衍生版本Hack 1.21和PDP-11版Hack中出现，也是[[Hack 1.0]]中最初加入游戏的物品之一。

==Variants==

In [[SLASH'EM]], [[upgrading]] an axe will produce a battle-axe and vice versa.

An axe appears in the left center courtyard of the [[Yeoman quest]] locate level.

[[Giantkiller]] is an [[artifact]] axe that replaces [[Giantslayer]] from ''NetHack''.

===UnNetHack===
In [[UnNetHack]], the peaceful [[iron golem]] generated in the forest within the [[Ruins of Moria]] is always generated with an axe.

The diskos uses the higher between a character's axe and [[polearms]] skills for damage if they are not twoweaponing or using a shield, and will otherwise default to axe skill if either is applicable.

Carrying [[The Air Crystal]] raises skill in axes by one level. [[Spirits (dNetHack)#Marionette, Puppet of Screams|Marionette, Puppet of Screams]] is a spirit that grants skill in axes while bound.

Giantslayer's [[base item]] is changed to an axe, and [[The Rod of Lordly Might]] and [[dNetHack artifacts#The Sceptre of Lolth|The Sceptre of Lolth]] can be [[invoke]]d to take on the form of an appropriate axe.

* An axe can be combined with a spear to create a [[voulge]].

===SlashTHEM===
In addition to SLASH'EM details, dwarven characters in [[SlashTHEM]] can reach a minimum of Skilled in axes.
